attributes.action: Ukrainian visa requirements to the UK to be waived.
attributes.additional_details: With the current situation developing in Ukraine, the Ukrainian people need the support of Great Britain now more than ever. The government have stated that they ‘Stand with Ukraine’ and this would be the ideal opportunity to prove that. Ireland have already waived the need for Ukrainians to provide a visa to enter the country and the UK should follow suit.
attributes.background: Remove the need for Ukrainians to provide a completed visa to enter the country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
